messages.subject: Re: Help in the "nonnutritive" food department... (long)
messages.msgSnippet: ***************  is inaccurate. If nuts are sauteed they are no longer raw .
messages.messageBody:
***************
<<Nuts - every sauteed raw almonds with a little butter and cinnamon?>>

is inaccurate. If nuts are "sauteed" they are no longer "raw".

***************

Uh, to point out the obvious (imo)...
I believe she's saying you START with raw almonds. She's not claiming they're still raw after you sautee them.
Sometimes it's great to slow down and reread some of the posts. I notice lately a lot of people are jumping to conclusions very quickly without fully reading or understanding what the poster is saying. If it's not clear to you, maybe it would help to ask the poster to clarify before jumping to conclusions. Just my .02 cents :-)




Meghan
